Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Target has escaped into the building. Commandant, your instruction?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv and I will follow it. You two go around and cut it off.', 3: '8', 4: "We'll pursue it together.", 5: '12'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lee and I will each take a side and flank it as quickly as possible!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Liv, we'll leave the front to you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We can easily outpower them even if it's a trap. Breaking through won't be a problem.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I'll do my best as well, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thanks to all of you.', 3: '31', 4: "It'll be great if we don't let one escape next time.", 5: '32'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll contact the Support Force to recycle the materials.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I know the operation strategy is your responsibility, but please don't be too harsh on yourself, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Oh... I'm sorry, we're departing, is it?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yeah, but what were you looking at? Did something come up on the radar?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'No, I was just looking at this church.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'This is where we encountered the silver-haired Construct, right?', 3: '48', 4: 'Are you interested in this place?', 5: '49'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '(Nods) ...Back then, this place felt like the gate to hell.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Standing here in silence, looking at how the spots of sunlight brighten the place... It feels peaceful and warm.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I know that... this isn't just a place for prayers, but also...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "The Support Force is arriving in five. We don't have to stay here anymore.", 4: '1'}
